status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b361m","text":"For SDS-PAGE and western blot analysis, collect cells by trypsinization and subsequent centrifugation at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b1kis","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C47AF020158C11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tqmk","text":" Wash the cell pellets in PBS and centrifuge once more at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2uo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E7DFE980158C11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df270","text":"Remove the supernatant and lyse the cell pellets in RIPA buffer supplemented by cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (11836170001, Roche) and phosphatase inhibitors (Phospho-STOP, 4906837001, Roche).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j03a","text":"After incubating in RIPA buffer for    , clear the samples by centrifugation at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"70815440158D11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"72B6F8F0158D11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"20000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7F715590158D11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evei3","text":"Collect the soluble supernatant fraction and measure the protein concentrations using the Pierce Detergent Compatible Bradford Assay Kit (23246, Thermo Fisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba8ur","text":"Then, adjust the samples for equal loading and mix it with 6x protein loading dye, supplemented with 100 mM DTT. Then, boil it for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"1141AC40158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"13F6BA20158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m9et","text":"Load the samples on 4-12% SDS-PAGE gels (NP0321BOX, NP0322BOX, or NP0323BOX, Thermo Fisher) with PageRuler Prestained protein marker (Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbeh7","text":"Transfer the proteins onto nitrocellulose membranes (RPN132D, GE Healthcare) for   at   using the Mini Trans-Blot Cell (Bio-Rad).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"3F483460158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"417BB630158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pkas","text":"After the transfer, block the membranes with 5% milk powder dissolved in PBS-Tween (0.1% Tween 20) for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"6CC7D940158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6F372B90158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dj0t3","text":"Incubate the membranes   at   with primary antibodies dissolved in the blocking buffer and wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"edc99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"8EB41550158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"923BDC80158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mbdh","text":"Then, incubate with species-matched secondary horseradish peroxidase (HRP)-coupled antibodies diluted 1:10,000 in blocking buffer for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"E8120B20158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EB16BFA0158E11EE8F38A59B4FE4F903","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"805o7","text":"Afterwards wash the membranes three times with PBS-T and further process for western blot detection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4j0tm","text":"Incubate the membranes with SuperSignal West Femto Maximum Sensitivity Substrate (34096, Thermo Fisher) and image it with a ChemiDoc MP system (Bio-Rad).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
